CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c,'Withdrawal') || ISPICKVAL(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c,'Redemption Konven'))&& Currency__c='USD', Amount__c * 14000, IF((ISPICKVAL(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c,'Withdrawal') || ISPICKVAL(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c,'Redemption Konven'))&& Currency__c!='USD',Amount__c, IF((ISPICKVAL(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c,'Redemption TM') || ISPICKVAL(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c,'Lapse TM'))&& Currency__c=='USD',(APE__c)/12*14000, IF((ISPICKVAL(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c,'Redemption TM') || ISPICKVAL(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c,'Lapse TM'))&& Currency__c!='USD',APE__c/12, IF(Currency__c=='USD',APE__c*14000,APE__c)))))
CustomField.label: APE / Amount Convert
